cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow (or very subtle shadow-sm)

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dashboard background (opacity 0.02)
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO gradients for backgrounds. Solid colors only.
visual_enhancers.motion: Micro-interactions on hover. Smooth transitions for modal open/close.

login_background.description: Abstract minimalist waves, black and white, structured but organic

user_avatar_employee.description: Man smiling holding camera, implies vacation/hobby

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a 'Corporate Strict' but 'Designed' application. Think Swiss Style: Grid, Typography, Whitespace. No decorative fluff.
instructions_to_main_agent.language: All UI text MUST be in Russian. Use 'Главная', 'Календарь', 'Заявки', 'Баланс', 'Выйти'.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_toggle: Implement a theme toggle in the top navigation. Default to System preference.
instructions_to_main_agent.fullcalendar: Use FullCalendar React component. Style it to match the theme using the CSS variables defined above. Remove default heavy borders.
instructions_to_main_agent.login_page: Split screen layout. Left: Branding/Typography (Sticky). Right: Login Form (Scrollable if needed). Use the 'login_background' image for the Left side with a dark overlay.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout. Top row: Key Metrics (Balance, Pending Requests). Middle: Calendar/Timeline. Bottom: Recent Activity.
instructions_to_main_agent.vacation_request: Use a Shadcn Dialog for the 'New Request' form. Use a Date Range Picker.
anti_ai_rules: DO NOT use purple or teal for primary actions. Use Slate-900 (Dark) or Slate-50 (Light).
DO NOT center everything. Use strong left alignment for text.
DO NOT use generic 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Use rounded-sm or rounded-none for a strict corporate look.

universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes (e.g., data-testid='submit-request-btn').
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA. Use focus-visible rings.
universal_guidelines.motion: Use 'sonner' for toasts. Animate route transitions subtly (opacity only).
